caption: Evidences
description: PLACEHOLDER. A collection of evidences associated to a security detection.
name: evidences

actor.description: Describes details about the user/role/process that was the source of the activity that triggered the detection.

api.description: Describes details about the API call associated to the activity that triggered the detection.

data.description: Additional evidence data that is not accounted for in the specific evidence attributes.

query.description: Describes details about the DNS query associated to the activity that triggered the detection.

resources.description: Describes details about resources that were the target of the activity that triggered the detection.
